tool_description: Compiles all analysis results into a comprehensive migration compatibility report with executive summary, technical details, and actionable recommendations.

analysis_result_ids.description: Array of all analysis result IDs to include in report

report_format.description: Report format: executive, technical, or comprehensive

stakeholder_level.description: Target stakeholder level: technical, management, or executive

priority_risks_only.description: Whether to focus only on high-priority risks

include_cost_estimates.description: Whether to include migration cost estimates

compliance_requirements.description: List of compliance requirements to address

error_messages: Analysis results not found: One or more analysis result IDs are invalid.
Invalid report format: Use executive, technical, or comprehensive.
Invalid stakeholder level: Use technical, management, or executive.
Report generation failed: Unable to compile analysis results into report.
Insufficient data: Minimum 2 analysis results required for comprehensive report.
usage: Provide analysis_result_ids array with all previous analysis results. Set report_format and stakeholder_level to customize output. Use optional parameters to focus on specific aspects like risks, costs, or compliance.

migration_feasibility.description: Migration feasibility assessment: feasible, challenging, or high-risk
